response.original_title: The Neal Morse Band: Live in Athens
response.overview: "What do you get when you take five nutty musicians and one crazy soundman to Israel and Greece? You get the May 2015 Inner Circle release! Randy has put together a short tour doc and we have a bunch of footage from the concert in Athens from 2013, and I think you are really going to enjoy this exclusive DVD coming your way this May. The footage was shot by the venue, I think, and it is not the highest quality in the world and the audio is camera audio unmixed and unpolished, however I think you will enjoy seeing and hearing us at this rare performance in Athens. My recollection of that night was that even though we were possibly as tired as I have ever been going into a performance, that is was one of the best gigs I have ever performed. A very special night indeed." â€“ Neal  Concert (86 mins)  1		Momentum 2		Author Of Confusion 3		Thoughts Pt 5 4		We All Need Some Light 5		World Without End 6		King Jesus 7		Sing It High Documentary (26 mins)  8		"Israel, Greece And Poland"
response.title: The Neal Morse Band: Live in Athens
